item.title: Network Traffic Generator and Packet Analyzer
item.description: In this project we developed an IPv4 packet generator to simulate any network traffic the user wants. We interfaced this through a web application to provide user the provision for customizing source and destination IPs and ports,the protocol to be used and amount of that data each of the packets carry. We analyzed the most used protocols and identifying clogging points in network.
